title: High Dia Teams - LF Scrims | Weekly/Fortnightly - Hash1 Prime, Hash1 Escape & Hash1 AlterEgo

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there,

We're currently looking for teams who are wanting to scrim our three high diamond teams Hash1 Prime, Hash1 AlterEgo and Hash1 Escape. If you're interested in scrimming either weekly or fortnightly, please send an email to admin@hash1gaming.com and we'll get back to you ASAP.

Cheers,

Tom / iPlayHeaps.

Our active rosters can also be found here; http://beta.hash1gaming.com/roster/
